pr_title: Update maven build description of pom.xml

timeline.message:
Update maven build description of pom.xml

IntiliJ was tripping up over pom.rst filename, renamed and took an oppertunity to update the section to use describe id and group id together, and dpeendency and dependency management together.

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Trying out InttelliJ and it was failing on file pom.rst. This has never been a problem before..
timeline.author: jodygarnett
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@ Using Maven
    snapshots
    javadocs
    eclipse
-   pom
+   maven_pom

timeline.author: jodygarnett
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,101 @@
+Project Object Model (POM) Files
+--------------------------------
+
+Complete documentation for the project XML file for Maven can be found at the Maven site, and in particular in the project descriptor part of the reference section.
+
+We only show the things specific to a GeoTools **module pom.xml** file here.

timeline.message:
revise based on review

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>
